alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 12:38AM EDT until July 13 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 6.1 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.6 feet on 04/12/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 12 am: 8.3 Forecast: Tue 2 am 8.3 Tue 8 am 8.0 Tue 2 pm 7.8 Tue 8 pm 7.6 Wed 2 am 7.5 Wed 8 am 7.4 Wed 2 pm 7.2 Wed 8 pm 6.9 Thu 2 am 6.7 Thu 8 am 6.5 Thu 2 pm 6.3 Thu 8 pm 6.1 &&
